channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- SDK, Java Technology Edition
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- SDK, Java Technology Edition

item.title: CVE-2022-40609|2024-10-17T18:51:39.988Z -- ibm -- sdk%2C%20java%20technology%20edition
item.description: IBM SDK, Java Technology Edition 7.1.5.18 and 8.0.8.0 could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an unsafe deserialization flaw. By sending specially-crafted data, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 236069.

item.title: CVE-2024-27267|2024-08-14T15:59:46.807Z -- ibm -- sdk%2C%20java%20technology%20edition
item.description: The Object Request Broker (ORB) in IBM SDK, Java Technology Edition 7.1.0.0 through 7.1.5.18 and 8.0.0.0 through 8.0.8.26 is vulnerable to remote denial of service, caused by a race condition in the management of ORB listener threads. IBM X-Force ID: 284573.

item.title: CVE-2023-38264|2024-08-02T17:39:12.051Z -- ibm -- sdk%2C%20java%20technology%20edition
item.description: The IBM SDK, Java Technology Edition's Object Request Broker (ORB) 7.1.0.0 through 7.1.5.21 and 8.0.0.0 through 8.0.8.21 is vulnerable to a denial of service attack in some circumstances due to improper enforcement of the JEP 290 MaxRef and MaxDepth deserialization filters. IBM X-Force ID: 260578.

item.title: CVE-2023-38264|2024-06-04T17:28:18.641Z -- ibm -- sdk%2C%20java%20technology%20edition
item.description: The IBM SDK, Java Technology Edition's Object Request Broker (ORB) 7.1.0.0 through 7.1.5.21 and 8.0.0.0 through 8.0.8.21 is vulnerable to a denial of service attack in some circumstances due to improper enforcement of the JEP 290 MaxRef and MaxDepth deserialization filters. IBM X-Force ID: 260578.

item.title: CVE-2024-27267|2024-08-14T18:28:56.564Z -- ibm -- sdk%2C%20java%20technology%20edition
item.description: The Object Request Broker (ORB) in IBM SDK, Java Technology Edition 7.1.0.0 through 7.1.5.18 and 8.0.0.0 through 8.0.8.26 is vulnerable to remote denial of service, caused by a race condition in the management of ORB listener threads. IBM X-Force ID: 284573.
